metadata.title: USN-5996-1 -- Liblouis vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Liblouis incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2023-26767, CVE-2023-26768, CVE-2023-26769)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5996-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  liblouis-bin - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.5 liblouis14 - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.5 python-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.5 liblouis-dev - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.5 python3-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.5 liblouis-data - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.5 No subscription required
